content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-85--87)
Consists of following entities:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (41,-86), (39,-85), (37,-85)
- Three wooden chests at positions (40.5,-87.5), (39.5,-83.5), (36.5,-86.5)
- Two burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5), (35.5,-85.5)
- Additional wooden chest for storage at (34.5,-86.5)

### Iron/Copper Ore Processing at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of following entities:
- Burner mining drill at (-28,-61)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5,-59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-27,-58)
- Two burner inserters at (-26.5,-59.5), (-25.5,-58.5)
- Output chest at (-24.5,-58.5)

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at position(x=-10 to -6, y=-59)
Consists of following entities:
- Three burner mining drills at (-10,-59), (-8,-59), (-6,-59)
- Multiple wooden chests at (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting components
- Multiple burner inserters managing material flow

### Iron Smelting Line at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of following entities:
- Four stone furnaces at (0,0), (2,0), (4,0), (6,0)
- Input inserters at (0.5,-1.5), (2.5,-1.5), (4.5,-1.5), (6.5,-1.5)
- Output inserters at (0.5,1.5), (2.5,1.5), (4.5,1.5), (6.5,1.5)
- Storage chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), (6.5,2.5)

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17-27)
Consists of following entities:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Small electric poles forming electricity network

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Errors
- Ensure sufficient coal is available in inventory before attempting to insert into boilers or other machines
- Multiple machines are showing "out of fuel" warnings - implement better fuel distribution system

### Entity Placement and Connection Errors
- Several inserters showing "waiting for space in destination" - ensure proper clearance and valid drop locations
- Transport belts showing blockage warnings - clear blocked belts or ensure proper item flow

### Fluid System Issues
- Steam engine showing "no input liquid" - verify complete pipe connections between offshore pump, boiler, and steam engine
- Ensure proper fluid flow direction in pipe networks

### Machine Operation Errors
- Multiple inserters waiting for source items - verify input supply chains are working
- Furnaces showing "no ingredients to smelt" - ensure proper ore supply
